title: ClientBlock configuration schema
description: Schema for the configuration file of the ClientBlock fabric mod.

action.description: Type of action when filtering a client. Will affect to the client list.

clients.description: Filtered clients list, will be blocked or allowed depending on the action.

kickMessage.description: Message to show on his screen when a player is disconnected because a client block.

logger.description: Whether to log the actions of the mod in the server console.
